content:
I think there are a few people who would like to fix some things on the API website but don't have access. Maybe this is something to sort out at the next meeting? I think @BWPanda (Peter) @docwilmot, myself for starters need access to codebase and user accounts to the actual site.

Maybe for things that require cli access could still be via @Nate Lampton

I was just looking at https://github.com/backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org/issues/38 which made me think of that

Improve documentation of globals in api.backdropcms.org 路 Issue #38 路 backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org
This is a duplicate of backdrop/backdrop-issues#2407 because I am not sure where to raise this topic. I would like to see a fuller list of the global variables that are set in core. I will gladly d...
I believe I have all the access I need (user account, admin access, server access), I just haven't found (made?) time to do much there lately...
